attributes.action: to abolish the AS and A2 system and bring back the old A level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
collges are manipulateing the system by not putting students through for the A2 year because
1 they hate the student 
2 to meet goverment targets on pass rates 
3 it is being used as bribury to get students to do what they want. eg not complting project work when they were doing course work for other subjects ect
 
students who can acheive high gradesare not being put for the A2 year over petti little things

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
